00026 #ifndef NOISECOLOURVALUE_H
00027 #define NOISECOLOURVALUE_H
00028 
00029 namespace noisepp
00030 {
00031 namespace utils
00032 {
00033 
00035 class ColourValue
00036 {
00037         public:
00039                 explicit ColourValue(float r=0.0f, float g=0.0f, float b=0.0f);
00040 
00042                 void writeRGB (unsigned char *& buffer);
00043 
00045                 float r;
00047                 float g;
00049                 float b;
00050 
00052                 static unsigned char toUChar (float f);
00053 
00055                 inline ColourValue operator+ (const ColourValue& c) const
00056                 {
00057                         ColourValue result;
00058                         result.r = r + c.r;
00059                         result.g = g + c.g;
00060                         result.b = b + c.b;
00061                         return result;
00062                 }
00064                 inline ColourValue operator- (const ColourValue& c) const
00065                 {
00066                         ColourValue result;
00067                         result.r = r - c.r;
00068                         result.g = g - c.g;
00069                         result.b = b - c.b;
00070                         return result;
00071                 }
00073                 inline ColourValue operator* (const ColourValue& c) const
00074                 {
00075                         ColourValue result;
00076                         result.r = r * c.r;
00077                         result.g = g * c.g;
00078                         result.b = b * c.b;
00079                         return result;
00080                 }
00082                 inline ColourValue operator/ (const ColourValue& c) const
00083                 {
00084                         ColourValue result;
00085                         result.r = r / c.r;
00086                         result.g = g / c.g;
00087                         result.b = b / c.b;
00088                         return result;
00089                 }
00091                 inline ColourValue operator* (float f) const
00092                 {
00093                         ColourValue result;
00094                         result.r = r * f;
00095                         result.g = g * f;
00096                         result.b = b * f;
00097                         return result;
00098                 }
00100                 inline ColourValue operator/ (float f) const
00101                 {
00102                         ColourValue result;
00103                         result.r = r / f;
00104                         result.g = g / f;
00105                         result.b = b / f;
00106                         return result;
00107                 }
00109                 inline ColourValue &operator += (const ColourValue& c)
00110                 {
00111                         r += c.r;
00112                         g += c.g;
00113                         b += c.b;
00114                         return *this;
00115                 }
00117                 inline ColourValue &operator -= (const ColourValue& c)
00118                 {
00119                         r -= c.r;
00120                         g -= c.g;
00121                         b -= c.b;
00122                         return *this;
00123                 }
00125                 inline ColourValue &operator *= (const ColourValue& c)
00126                 {
00127                         r *= c.r;
00128                         g *= c.g;
00129                         b *= c.b;
00130                         return *this;
00131                 }
00133                 inline ColourValue &operator /= (const ColourValue& c)
00134                 {
00135                         r /= c.r;
00136                         g /= c.g;
00137                         b /= c.b;
00138                         return *this;
00139                 }
00141                 inline ColourValue &operator *= (float f)
00142                 {
00143                         r *= f;
00144                         g *= f;
00145                         b *= f;
00146                         return *this;
00147                 }
00149                 inline ColourValue &operator /= (float f)
00150                 {
00151                         r /= f;
00152                         g /= f;
00153                         b /= f;
00154                         return *this;
00155                 }
00156 
00157         protected:
00158         private:
00159 };
00160 
00161 };
00162 };
00163 
00164 #endif // NOISECOLOURVALUE_H
